channel.title: Karma SMF Help
channel.description:
Hey I was wondering if anyone knew how to do the Rep think like mopar.
like the more rep you have the more rep you can give. Say if you have 200 rep you give 13 on mopar
What is the mod for that? Or is it custom?
ALSO: When I download Karma Description mod, it says it is corrupt or not compatible, but I am using 2.0.2 version with the 2.0.2 version.

item.title: Karma SMF Help

item.description:
